name: Modern Chronological Resume
description: This modern chronological resume or CV emphasizes your experience by showing your most recent jobs first. Use this resume template to create a resume for a professional job search package.

name: Basic Modern Resume
description: Use this modern resume template to create a resume that gets results. You don't need a flashy design to get the job. This modern professional templates features a simple, clean look and feel that is guaranteed to get you that job.
